kpi.name: s1_success_rate_all_qci
kpi.description: Success rate of S1 interface setup procedures across all QCIs.

kpi.name: rrc_est_success_rate_all_qci
kpi.description: Success rate of RRC connection establishment attempts across all QCIs.

kpi.name: erab_accessibility_all_qci
kpi.description: Probability that an E-RAB can be successfully established for all QCIs.

kpi.name: erab_drop_call_rate_all_qci
kpi.description: Percentage of dropped E-RAB connections across all QCIs.

kpi.name: cell_availability
kpi.description: Percentage of time the cell is available for service.

kpi.name: rssi
kpi.description: Received Signal Strength Indicator, measuring the power level of received signals.

kpi.description: Execution success rate of intra-LTE handovers.

kpi.name: intra_lte_ho_success_rate
kpi.description: Overall success rate of intra-LTE handovers.

kpi.name: pdcp_sdu_dl_throughput
kpi.description: Average downlink throughput measured at the PDCP layer.

kpi.name: pdcp_sdu_ul_throughput
kpi.description: Average uplink throughput measured at the PDCP layer.
